title: Introduction to HTML
content: Learn what HTML is and how it structures web content. HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages.
expected_output: A web page displaying 'Hello World!' as a heading

title: HTML Document Structure
content: Understanding the basic structure of HTML documents including DOCTYPE, html, head, and body elements.

title: Common HTML Elements
content: Learn about headings, paragraphs, links, images, and other common HTML elements.
code_template:
Main Heading

Subheading

This is a paragraph.

This is a link
expected_output: Page with various HTML elements properly structured

title: HTML Forms and Input
content: Create interactive forms with various input types and form validation.

title: Semantic HTML
content: Learn about semantic HTML elements like header, nav, main, section, article, and footer.

title: CSS Basics and Selectors
content: Introduction to CSS syntax, selectors, and basic styling properties.
expected_output: Styled HTML elements with colors and fonts

title: Box Model and Layout
content: Understanding the CSS box model: margin, border, padding, and content.

title: Flexbox Layout
content: Learn CSS Flexbox for creating flexible and responsive layouts.

title: CSS Grid Layout
content: Master CSS Grid for creating complex two-dimensional layouts.

title: Responsive Design
content: Create websites that work on all devices using media queries and responsive units.
